channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stellantis and Aston Martin shares drop sharply after profit warnings amid China woes
item.description: Stocks of European carmakers hemorrhaged early on Monday as Stellantis and British luxury brand Aston Martin issued profit warnings.

item.title: AT&T sells 70% stake in DirecTV to TPG for $7.6 billion
item.description: AT&T said on Monday it would sell its 70% stake in satellite TV service DirecTV to private equity firm TPG for $7.6 billion.

item.title: California governor signs 2 bills to protect children from AI-generated deepfake sexual images
item.description: Current law does not allow district attorneys to go after people who possess or distribute AI-generated child sexual abuse images if they cannot prove...

item.title: Here’s why Japan’s stocks are plunging after Shigeru Ishiba’s win
item.description: Shigeru Ishida had beaten Economic Security Minister Sanae Takaichi in the final round of the Liberal Democratic Party election on Friday.

item.title: Baxter is keeping its largest manufacturing facility closed due to flooding
Michigan nuclear plant finalizes federal loan to support first reactor restart in U.S. history
item.description: The restart of the reactor at Palisades would mark a milestone for the nuclear industry after a decadelong wave of reactor shutdowns in the U.S.

item.title: Hybrid work boosts pay for all, study finds, debunking employer myth of inequality
item.description: A new equilibrium in the hybrid work space means in-office workers are getting pay bumps while remote workers enjoyed other benefits.

item.title: Chrysler parent Stellantis slashes guidance, plans inventory adjustment
‘Sell in May’ was a costly mistake. Should you buy stocks now at record highs?
Fortnite-maker Epic Games is suing Google and Samsung, accusing them of colluding to keep its app store out
item.description: Epic said that in July 2024, Samsung changed Auto Blocker from an "opt-in" feature to the default setting, forcing users to navigate a cumbersome 21-s...

item.title: Monday's analyst calls: JPMorgan Chase gets downgraded, consulting stock is a buy
item.description: A banking giant and a consulting company were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Monday.

item.title: China’s beleaguered real estate shares jump almost 10% after Beijing makes its ‘strongest housing pledge to date’
item.description: Investors gave China's stock markets their best week in years after Beijing promised more stimulus measures to support the economy.

item.title: Aston Martin shares rocked by profit warning
Rightmove calls for ‘best and final’ offer after rejecting third Murdoch bid of £6.2 billion
item.description: After Rightmove's latest rejection, Rupert Murdoch's REA faces a U.K. takeover deadline later today.

item.title: Chinese stocks rally again on Monday amid further stimulus hopes
